alert.note: Alert for Chase; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 30 at 12:49AM CDT until June 30 at 1:30AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Perkins County in southwestern Nebraska... Northeastern Chase County in southwestern Nebraska... * Until 1230 AM MDT. * At 1148 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southwest of Grant, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Grant and Madrid. This includes Highway 61 between mile markers 48 and 69. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
